comments.comment:
What did you do do??? Didn't your drunkard son and the clan killed a Traffic O.I.C. but all they all got bail.????Your candidate promised full powers to Tamils and that's why he lost.!!! Of course the Buddhist Prelates helped to bring this govt.,  to power, because if Sajith has won, it would have been the end of our independence.!! The Prelates had to recede for the time being  and there is no mistake they will return if there is any threat to the country.!!! 
U.N.P government was deaf and dumb to stop various atrocities by racist minorities, like demolishing Buddhist statues  in the North and East, allow Muslims to by forcefully occupy  certain Buddhist religious places,  took Buddhist Prelates to custody, didn't say a word about Gurukanda Chief Prelates cremation, where  some Tamils got a court order to stop it and the list goes on and on.!!
Stop accusing and moaning and accept defeat.!!! You people were A grade liars too.!!! Ordinary people don't like violators like you or your party, as your party treated Buddhism, Buddhist Prelates and Sinhalese  like second hand citizens.!!! We will never let U.N.P. win, as it was the worst govt. we ever had.!!!! People are no fools and your party can go on accusing and sliding mud at the new Govt. won with a  majority of  Sinhalese votes though Sajith  won a load of Minority votes as shown in the EELAM areas, because of his promise.!!! For greediness for minority votes,  his leader also tried granting full powers to Tamils in 2015 and then Sajith in 2019, which failed drastically and rejected by the majority.!!!
Nevertheless, the  incident about the Swiss Embassy employee is vey suspicious, as it may be a 'set-up' by some politically defunct party to sling mud at the new government, or some  kind of racket by a certain minority, whose wishes didn't come true or perhaps it can be an arranged hoax.!!!
SRI LANKANS NEEDED A PEOPLE FRIENDLY PRESIDENT WHO WILL NOT DEVOLVE  POWER AND THAT'S THE REASON WHY SLPP IN POWER NOW.!!!
comments.author: KENSHIRO

comments.comment: Gota-Mahinda-Basil are all behind these dramas and especially the bombing of Churches that killed innocent Christians. They suck blood as a family hailing from Dracula genes inherited to Medamulana. One should analyse their DNA. I totally blame the so called Buddhist monks who do not follow Buddhist principles and instead follow principles of Mahinda nikaya monks who divide the country to many segments most importantly dividing Buddhists to follow a new nilkaya called Mahinda Nikaya from all other Buddhists. Hiru openly says that UNP likes Buddhism now. That means Hiru likes to divide Buddhism on political basis to say those who follow Mahinda are true Buddhists and the rest are not. That is why I said that Mahinda has formed a NEW NIKAYA to which any monk from any other nikaya is free to join while staying in their previous nikayas. The newly named ''COBRA'' temple in Kelaniya is a classic example of this in addition to Bellanwila, Gangaramaya, and several others. Buddhists monks are abusing Buddhism and Buddhist culture. Their abusive words and abusive and hatred speeches and behaviour are encouraging young monks in universities to behave worse. Devotees have no more time to tolerate such acts of monks. All these Boru Bala Senawa, Ravana Bayagulu senawa did not do anything to Buddhism. They never visited villages and tried to advise people to refrain from drinking. abusing children, spouses etc. Did NO service to people. They accused Muslims and Tamils for damaging Buddhists places. That is correct but actually they have been damaging Buddhist principles which has damaged Buddhist culture all around the world. These ''DUSSEELA'' monks MUST be chased away or people must nor respect them. They a a type of robed underworld gangsters. Many of them drik, smoke, drive cars and even abuse children and women. Proof is available with those who have links with temples but people do not come out with evidence because they want to save the religion when monmls are destroying religion. The robe has being used as a weapon by gangsters. This is the worst era in the country where people have started accusing monks. They should understand that there should be a reason for accusations. True many monks are gangsters. Peopkle are better than monks today. They protect Buddhism more devotedly when monks destroy it.
comments.author: Wickes Anderson
